casebody.data:
James H. Shady, Respondent v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided January 29, 1892. Appeal by defendant from judgment entered on the report of a referee. Davies & Rapallo, attorneys, and Plerbert Barry of counsel, for appellants. Edwin M. Felt, for respondent.

Before Freedman, P. J., McAdam and Gildersleeve, JJ.

*498Opinion by Gildersleeve, J.; Freedman, P. J., and McAdam, J., concurred.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
